name: eleventy-from-scratch
description: [Andy Bell](https://twitter.com/hankchizljaw) teaches [11ty](https://www.11ty.dev/) with the course [Learn Eleventy From Scratch](https://learneleventyfromscratch.com).

scripts.start: npx gulp && concurrently "npx gulp watch" "npx eleventy --serve"
scripts.production: NODE_ENV=production npx gulp && NODE_ENV=production npx eleventy
